_header: Saint Martin was I-bore in the land of Sabaria
Subjects: saints’ lives; Martin, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Martin in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEyn martin was ibore In þe lond of sabarieWel longe he was
                    Inorised In þe lond of papie…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Vour score wynter he was old ar he deide alsoNou god ous
                    ȝeue part of þulke Ioie þat is soule wende to

Bod779.First Lines:
Sein martin was I bore In þe lond of salaryeWel ȝong he
                    was I norched in þe londe of papye…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…ffoure score winter he was old ar he deyde alsonowȝ god
                    geue vs part of þilke ioye þat he was in I do

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
SEint Martyn was ibore in þe londe of SabarieWel ȝong he
                    was i noriced in þe londe of Papie…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Four score winter he was old are he was ded alsoGod ȝiue
                    us part of þulke ioye Þat is soule wende to
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS
         o.s. 87 (1887; repr. 1987): 449-56.

BodLauMis463.First Lines: SEint Martyn was y bore in þe lond of Thabarye
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
ȝong he was norisshed in þe lond of
                    Papye……ffoure skore ȝer he was old er he diede
                    alsoGod vs ȝeue part of þilk ioye þat he was inne y
                    do
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

CULAdd3039.First Lines:
Sayne Martyne was borne in þe lande of SabarieAnd ful
                    ȝonge he noriste was in þe lande of PapyeHis fadre was a grete
                    lorde & maistre of al þe knyghteȝVndre þe emperoure
                    Constantyne in bataileȝ & in fighteȝ…
CULAdd3039.Last Lines:
…ffoure score wynter he was olde when he gonne hethens
                    twyneGod graunte vs parte of þe ioye þat sayn martyn is
                    Inne

CamFitzMc128.First Lines:
…At a gret fest as he shuld the hegh masse singTo churche
                    went with his men men con again him ring…
CamFitzMc128.Last Lines:
…ffourscore ȝere he was old or he was ded alsoGod gif vs
                    part of that Ioie ther in is he idoo

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Martin was ybore in þe lond of SabaryeWel ȝong he
                    was ynorissched in þe lond of paimonye…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…ffour score wynter he was old ar he deyde þereNow god vs
                    graunty þulke ioye þat aungeles his soule to bere

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint martyn was ybore in þe londe of arabie¡onge he was
                    ynorsched in þe londe of apye…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…foure score ȝere he was olde ar he deyde al sogod ous
                    bringe to þe Ioie þat his saule was in ido

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEint martin was ibore in þe lond of sarabiewel ȝong he was ynorseþ in þe lond of papie…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …four score winter he was ar he deide alsonou god ȝif ous part of þilke ioie þat he was Inne ido
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum lxxviii” added to left margin by later hand (f. 173v).

BLEge2810.Last Lines: …Vour score winter he was old ar he deide alsoNou god ous ȝeue þat of þulke ioye þat is soule is in ydo

BLEge2891.Last Lines: …ffour score winter he was old ar he deide alsoNou god us ȝiue part of þulke ioie þat he was Inne ido

BLHar2250.First Lines:
Saynt martyne was borne in þe londe of savarieWel ȝonge
                    he was noryssht in þe londe of papie…
BLHar2250.Last Lines:
…Four score wynter he wos olde er he deghid alsoNow god gife
                    vs part of þat ioy þat his soule is inne ido

BLHar2277.First Lines: SEint martin was ibore in þe lond of cebarieWel ȝung he was ynorisched in þe lond of Papie…
BLHar2277.Last Lines: …ffourscore wynter he was old er he deide alsoNou god ous ȝyue part of þulke ioye þat he was inne ido

BLSto949.First Lines: Seynt martyn was ybore in þe lond of sabaryeWel ȝong he was ynorsched in þe lond of papye…
BLSto949.Last Lines: …ffour score winter he was old ar he dyȝed al soNou god vs ȝeue part of þulke ioyȝe þat is soul is inne ydo

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt Martyn was born in þe lond of barbaryeWel ȝonge
                    norisshed he was in þe lond of Papys…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…ffoure score ȝere he was olde er he was ded alsoGod
                    ȝeue vs part of þat ioye þere he is in y do Amen

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seynt Martyne was ybore in þe londe of SabariFul ȝenge he
                    was norshed in þe londe of Ytalie…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…iiij ȝere he was olde or he dyed alsoGod ȝeue vs
                    part of þat blisse þat his saule is in do. Amen.
